Title: Hymenoptera of the World
Author: John I Huber

These diagrams serve as reference illustrations for understanding insect morphology.

Title: Hymenoptera of the World
Author: John I Huber
Image Description: The image depicts a diagram related to a "tibial spur," which is described as a spine-like, multicellular extension of the cuticle. The diagram illustrates the structure and positioning of the tibial spur on a leg appendage.

Title: Hymenoptera of the World
